Cyber World is a bit like the Matrix. Since there are cities that are
very advanced, they built a communication network just like internet,
only it's a lot bigger and a lot more intelligent. NPCs in Cyberworld
would be drone programs, firewalls, virus, hackers, and so on.
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> SPies-Mercenaries 3
> Police
> Diplomatics
> Pacificus MAximals
> Iron skull Preds
> Traders
> Corrupt
> Minions
> 
> 
> What's Cyberworld?
> How do you name those poeple whose tells info to police, detectives
and crimiminals?
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, June 09, 2005 6:32 PM
>   Subject: OOC: NPCs Repartition
> 
> 
>   Ok, just to make sure, what categories of NPCs would you like to be in
>   charge of? Please, make sure you set a priority of 1, 2 and 3, so we
>   can give you the categories you would like first, second, or third.
> 
>   Civilians
>   Police
>   Military
>   Scientific 
>   Diplomatic and government
>   Watchers
>   Pacificus Maximals
>   Silver Wings Maximals
>   Bushido Predacons
>   Iron Skull Predacons
>   Traders
>   Industrials
>   Corrupt (mafia-like)
>   Cyberworld
>   Minion (Only the leader (Major NPC), others are drones)
> 
>   (And don't worry about me, I don't mind picking last)
> 
>
